strengths: Strong racial abilities and opening fleet
Superior planet retention — very hard to dislodge
Inflicts significant damage at minimal cost
weaknesses: Low threat perception can make you a target of opportunity
Late-game infantry flood factions counter you (Arborec, Sol)
tips: Exploit your early advantage before opponents develop fleets
Rapidly acquire numerous planets plus Mecatol Rex
Prioritize influence (0/2 planets are optimal due to Indoctrination ability)
Deploy destroyers throughout your slice defensively; position flagship at home
Maintain an accessible 0/2 planet for Indoctrination after passing
Consistently select Leadership and Warfare when available
Threaten without following through — your ability to inflict damage cheaply is a deterrent

techPaths.name: Yellow + Green (with yellow skip)
techPaths.note: Optimal; Transit Diodes + Space Dock II on Mecatol
